item.description:
It's 2013! What are your WordPress resolutions? If you are a website owner do you want to learn more about responsive design, attend a WordCamp, improve the speed of your site, or improve the security of your site?  If you are a developer, do you want to learn LESS or SASS, build a plugin, build child themes, contribute to WordPress core or share your knowledge at Meetups or in the supports forums? Plus, what's coming in 3.6?

We will be meeting in a new location this time. Thanks to Knectar Design (http://www.knectar.com/) for supporting the group. It has been two months since we last met. Bring your goals for the new year, your knowledge and insights or your questions. It should be a good discussion. Ed will also have some follow-up on the launch of the Mount Holyoke College Alumnae Association website (http://alumnae.mtholyoke.edu/) and how that is working out.

Be sure to check out the new WordPress Meetup website at http://www.valleywp.org/.

This meetup is for developers, designers, or end-users.
item.how_to_find_us: Use Google Maps to find directions: http://goo.gl/maps/IrqIL

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: February 2013 WordPress Meetup
